Posts.Content: Dec 13, 2008 02:24AM - edited Dec 13, 2008 02:26AM by Joy232 Keep your determination and do everything you can to help and educate yourself.   Its so much to learn in such a short time.  I remember the daze and confusion.  My diagnosis came in March 03 and I didn't finish until December.  There was the surgery, recovery, chemo 8 treatments - 3 weeks apart, recovery, and then the radiation.  It can take a while.  Did the doctor ever mention shrinking the tumors before the surgery so you could possibly avoid mastectomy? God bless and have faith.  You will get through this.
